players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "This is terrible! Charlie's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious? I'm looking at everyone equally right now."
Bob: "I'm shocked Charlie is gone. We need to be careful and share any observations, no matter how small."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. My investigation confirms it. We must vote her out now to win."

You: "Diana, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. If you were really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so early and become an easy target? This feels like a desperate mafia play to me."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice first? That seems like an odd choice with no prior info. I'm suspicious of both claims now."
